text: 'idh qal lahum 'akhuhum hwd: 'alaa takhshawn allah ftkhlsu lah alebad? 'iiniy mrsal 'iilaykum lhdaytkm w'irshadkm, hafiz ealaa risalatan allh, abllighha lakum kama amrny rby, fkhafu eiqab allah watyewny fima jitukum bih min eind allh. wama 'atlub minkum ealaa 'irshadkm 'iilaa altwhyd ay nawe min 'anwae alajr, ma 'ajri 'iilaa ealaa rabi alealmyn
